hangle: 이런 게 풀려났다면 많은 사상자를 냈겠지.
first_translate: if this thing  was released into the city, there must’ve been many casualties already.
fiona made the right call by rushing us here as quickly as possible.
a horde of monsters is approaching from over there!
I’m glad I came out to see what was going on.
someone has clearly let these creatures loose.
don’t leave any alive! kill them all!
the winter guardian lives up to his name...!

hangle: 이건 확실하게 목을 잘라야 하는 마물인가 보네.
first_translate: well then, looks like we’ll need to cut its head off.
do you want some help clearing away the other monsters too?
no, I can handle that part along with my knights.

hangle: 같이 처리하는 게 좋을 것 같은데.
first_translate: but wouldn’t it be better if--
then why don’t you just give me a good luck kiss instead?
have you lost your mind recently or something?
go finish the job before things get worse.
it’s the owner of the arena!

hangle: 이렇게 작은 여자가 이 일의 책임자라고?
first_translate: is she seriously responsible for everything that happened today?

hangle: 아무래도 드디어 말이 통할 만한 상대가 온 것 같군요…
first_translate: at last, someone worth talking to shows up around here...

hangle: 제게 이런 식으로 굴면 후에 틀림없이 후회하실 겁니다.
first_translate: treat me poorly at your own peril.
maybe I should scare her a little bit first.
let me tell you a secret only you will know about.

hangle: 제 뒤에는 매우 무서운 분들이 있거든요.
first_translate: there are very scary people backing me up.
all of those men are subject to conscription.
that saves us money since they won’t be able to pay their way out of service anymore.

hangle: 제가 감히 입에 올릴 수 없이 고귀한 분도 계시죠!
first_translate: ...the most noble person whose name cannot even pass through my lips!

hangle: 절 풀어주시면 이번 일은 전부 없던 걸로 해 드리죠.
first_translate: release me, and I promise none of this ever happened.
do you know who I am?
we found one more inside the stadium.
we found one more inside the stadium.
what exactly do you mean “in this empire”?

hangle: 그럼 현재 당신은 방금 무례를 저지른 한낱 범죄자군요.
first_translate: then currently, you’re nothing but a criminal who committed treason against the imperial family.
put him down on his knees.
seems like things were taken care of here too.
you damn son of a b*tch!!
who dares speak ill of the prince?
I wonder how bold you could possibly be to act so brazenly toward royalty.

hangle: 신원 미상의 범죄자 얼굴 좀 볼까?
first_translate: let’s take a look at our unknown criminal’s face.
why, I didn’t notice you earlier.

hangle: 어째서 이런 곳에 계시는 겁니까, 형님?
first_translate: what brings you to such a place, brother?
